channel.title: Deleteing In-game Text
channel.description: Ok how do i delete the in game text?.. like "server created by blah blah and shit like that" i tryed opening my client and ctrl+f and entering it but when i delete then save it always comes back.. i also compile when i delete but its still there??

item.title: Deleteing In-game Text
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

WINDOWS M£DIA:

[quote]The owner of the source may not allow you to change it, try a different source.

^^^^^^^^^^^

OMFG !!! ROFL !!! DUDE go to npchandler.java and search the text then delete

STILL[quote]The owner of the source may not allow you to change it, try a different source.[/quote]
OMFG[/quote]You’re an idiot. Read the TOS. Only post things that you know are true. Therefore, you just broke a rule.

Anyways - with what you need help with.
Open up client.java and search for the string you need to change.
Find it, and replace it with what you need.
Save your changes, and then compile your source.
Compiled class files should be created, and you…
Have to make sure you run THOSE class files.
So check your paths in the batch file.

Read full topic
